@TheDriverG @BRCWCo @janepursey @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding I have seen and it sickens me.

@EmilyFarndon1 @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding I live close to a major A-Road and a railway. The road is noisy 24/7, it is smelly and congested. The railway is quiet most of the time, it does not pollute. HS2 will take cars off the road, reduce lorries and freight; it will free up paths for more trains on my railway line.
